summary: Front-end Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience driving process improvement in HR, Operations, and Sales.
Created and Maintained an Excel VBA at the United Nations that dramatically reduced recruitment times during the refugee crisis

tasks: Completed 500+ hour immersive training in Full Stack Software Engineering
Developed skills and fluency on 5 projects using HTML, CSS (applying the BEM method), JavaScript and React framework for a responsive frontend and API calls
Built full-stack web applications using SQL, MongoDB, Express, Node, Ruby and Ruby on Rails for the backend
Researched relevant Computer Science topics, such as data structures, and reviewed algorithm solutions in daily lessons
Collaborated with UX Design team on 2 projects using Agile Methodology to reinvent restaurant website
Employed version control and basic Git use on all projects (https://github.com/johnpmeyers20)
Embarked on deep dive into JavaScript and the fundamentals of web development outside of work
Decided to invest in my passion for code and was accepted to General Assembly
Learned the fundamentals of sales (sold over $50,000 in guitars and gear every month), which translate easily to Software
Used communication skills to help clients achieve better understanding of product
